name: $draft
desc: The request is ready to be acted upon.

name: $active
desc: The authorization/request to act has been temporarily withdrawn but is expected to resume in the future.

name: $suspended
desc: The authorization/request to act has been terminated prior to the full completion of the intended actions.  No further activity should occur.

name: $cancelled
desc: Activity against the request has been sufficiently completed to the satisfaction of the requester.

name: $completed
desc: This electronic record should never have existed, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it.  (If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "cancelled" rather than "entered-in-error".).

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this observation. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.
